trans-unit.source: Installing Chef Automate and Chef Infra Server on the same host using a configuration file also requires the use of the Chef Automate CLI. Installations require elevated privileges, so run the commands as the superuser or use sudo at the start of each command.

trans-unit.source: Installing Chef Infra Server through Chef Automate using a configuration file also requires the use of the Chef Automate CLI. When Chef Automate deploys the Chef Infra Server, it automatically configures the Chef Infra Server to collect data to send to Chef Automate. To deploy a standalone Chef Infra Server with Chef Automate, you must turn off data collection in the configuration. Installations require elevated privileges, so run the commands as the superuser or use sudo at the start of each command.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置文件通过Chef Automate安装Chef Infra Server时，还需要使用Chef Automate CLI。当Chef Automate部署Chef Infra Server时，它将自动配置Chef Infra Server收集数据以发送到Chef Automate。要将独立的Chef Infra Server与Chef Automate一起部署，您必须在配置中关闭数据收集。安装需要提升的特权，因此以超级用户身份运行命令或在每个命令的开头使用 sudo 。

trans-unit.source: Installs the software. Delegates most of the implementation to the do_default_install() function. You should override this behavior if you need to perform custom installation steps, such as copying files from HAB_CACHE_SRC_PATH to specific directories in your package, or installing pre-built binaries into your package.

trans-unit.source: Instance class that is used to run this version. Valid values are AutomaticScaling: F1, F2, F4, F4_1G BasicScaling or ManualScaling: B1, B2, B4, B4_1G, B8 Defaults to F1 for AutomaticScaling and B2 for ManualScaling and BasicScaling. If no scaling is specified, AutomaticScaling is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 用于运行此版本的实例类。有效值为AutomaticScaling。F1,F2,F4,F4_1G BasicScaling 或 ManualScaling:B1,B2,B4,B4_1G,B8 AutomaticScaling默认为F1,ManualScaling和BasicScaling默认为B2。如果没有指定缩放比例,则选择AutomaticScaling。

trans-unit.source: Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior should be reported by contacting any of the Community Advocates directly. Each person’s contact information and role is listed in the repo that links to this document. If you were not linked here, then contact the individuals listed below. All complaints will be reviewed, investigated, and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.
trans-unit.target: 虐待，骚扰或其他不可接受的行为应通过直接与任何社区代言人联系来报告。每个人的联系信息和角色都在链接到此文档的存储库中列出。如果您未在此处链接，请联系下面列出的个人。所有的投诉都将得到审查，调查，并会导致认为是与情况相关的必要和适当的答复。项目团队有责任对事件的举报人保持机密。具体实施政策的更多详细信息可能会单独发布。

trans-unit.source: Instead of setting the token directly in /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb as was done in older versions of the Chef Infra Server, we’ll use the set-secret command, so that your API token does not live in plaintext in a file:
trans-unit.target: 与其像在较早版本的Chef Infra Server中那样直接在 /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb 中设置令牌，我们将使用 set-secret 命令，以便您的API令牌不会以纯文本格式存在于一份文件：

trans-unit.source: Instead of tracking a specific branch or doing a headless checkout, Chef Infra Client maintains its own branch (via the git resource) that does not exist in the upstream repository. Chef Infra Client is then free to forcibly check out this branch to any commit without destroying the local history of an existing branch.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client可以维护自己的分支（通过git资源），而不是跟踪特定的分支或进行无头的结帐，而该分支在上游存储库中不存在。然后，Chef Infra Client可以自由地将该分支强行检出以进行任何提交，而不会破坏现有分支的本地历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Instead of tracking a specific branch or doing a headless checkout, the chef-client maintains its own branch (via the git resource) that does not exist in the upstream repository. The chef-client is then free to forcibly check out this branch to any commit without destroying the local history of an existing branch.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client维护自己的分支（通过git资源），而不是跟踪特定的分支或进行无头的结帐，而该分支在上游存储库中不存在。然后，chef-client可以自由地将该分支强制检出到任何提交，而不会破坏现有分支的本地历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Integrating Workflow with your LDAP system allows you to automatically add more user details and authenticate users against your existing identity management system. However, even once your LDAP system has been integrated to Workflow, you must manually add users. If you are going to add a user in your integrated LDAP system to Workflow, you must have their LDAP name.
trans-unit.target: 将Workflow与LDAP系统集成后,可以自动添加更多的用户信息,并通过现有的身份管理系统对用户进行认证。然而,即使你的LDAP系统已经集成到Workflow中,你也必须手动添加用户。如果你要在你的LDAP系统中添加一个用户到Workflow中,你必须有他们的LDAP名称。

trans-unit.source: It is also entirely possible that the access of the current_resource was never intended by the user. If this behavior was undesired, the correct remediation would be to simply access the property through the new_resource.property_name. We cannot determine and accurately report to the user when this deprecation message is incorrect, we can only report on compatible behavior. The suggestion of the deprecation warning to access the property through current_resource.property_name may be incorrect, and it is up to the discretion of the user to choose the appropriate remediation for their needs.
trans-unit.target: 完全有可能用户从未打算访问 current_resource 。如果不希望出现这种情况，则正确的补救措施是仅通过 new_resource.property_name 访问该属性。当此弃用消息不正确时，我们无法确定并准确地向用户报告，我们只能报告兼容行为。关于通过 current_resource.property_name 访问该属性的弃用警告的建议可能是错误的，并且用户可以自行决定是否选择适当的补救措施来满足他们的需求。

trans-unit.source: It is important to also consider what side effects the command to execute will have. For example, does the command spin off other processes in separate process groups? If so, they may not be cleaned up automatically when the system is reconfigured. In general, the command executed should behave in a manner similar to a daemon, and be able to clean up properly after itself when it receives a SIGTERM, and properly forward signals to other processes that it creates. For an even more specific example: let’s say you are trying to start a node.js service. Instead of your command being npm start, you should use node server.js directly.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是还要考虑要执行的命令会有哪些副作用。例如，该命令是否会分离单独进程组中的其他进程？如果是这样，则在重新配置系统时，它们可能不会自动清除。通常，执行的命令的行为应类似于守护程序，并且在接收到SIGTERM时能够正确地对其自身进行清理，并将信号正确转发给它创建的其他进程。举一个更具体的例子：假设您正在尝试启动一个node.js服务。而不是使用 npm start 命令，应该直接使用 node server.js 。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that you may have a situation where some projects are entirely independent and have no dependencies on other projects. In this case, it does not matter what state those other projects are in. If their tests pass, Chef Automate will allow their changes to promote through.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,你可能会遇到这样的情况:有些项目是完全独立的,对其他项目没有依赖性。在这种情况下,这些其他项目处于什么状态并不重要。如果他们的测试通过了,Chef Automate就会允许他们的更改通过推广。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that only automatic_attribute_whitelist be used to whitelist attributes. This is primarily because automatic attributes generate the most data, but also that normal, default, and override attributes are typically much more important attributes and are more likely to cause issues if they are whitelisted incorrectly.

Therefore it is essential that users take the proper steps before downloading certificates into this directory.

trans-unit.source: It’s important to note that the entries for plan_path and paths do not behave the same. If you have something like plan_path = "habitat", that behaves as if you had written plan_path = "habitat/*" - that is, it will automatically check every file under the habitat directory. However, if you have something like paths = [ "src" ], that is not automatically expanded to src/*. That line will only watch for changes to a file called src. If you’re wanting to watch for changes to any file inside the src directory, then you must explicitly specify the glob, like so: paths = [ "src/*" ].
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意， plan_path 和 paths 的条目的行为不同。如果您有诸如 plan_path = "habitat" ，则其行为就像您编写了 plan_path = "habitat/*" -也就是说，它将自动检查 habitat 目录下的每个文件。但是，如果您有类似 paths = [ "src" ] ，则不会自动将其扩展为 src/* 。该行将仅监视对名为 src 的文件的更改。如果要监视 src 目录中任何文件的更改，则必须显式指定glob，如下所示： paths = [ "src/*" ] 。

trans-unit.source: It’s important to note that you may have a situation where some projects are entirely independent and have no dependencies on other projects. trans-unit.target: 重要的是要注意，您可能会遇到某些项目完全独立并且不依赖于其他项目的情况。在这种情况下，其他项目处于什么状态都没关系。如果测试通过，Chef Automate将允许他们进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Knife and other Chef tools use the cookbook name specified inside of either the metadata.rb file or the policyfile.rb file, which is case sensitive. Naming cookbooks in all lower-case is the easiest way to avoid conflicts with your knife or chef commands.

trans-unit.source: Knife can also use the knife exec subcommand to make specific, authenticated requests to the Chef Infra Server. knife plugins can also make authenticated requests to the Chef Infra Server by leveraging the knife exec subcommand.
trans-unit.target: 刀还可以使用 knife exec 子命令向Chef Infra服务器发出经过身份验证的特定请求。通过利用 knife exec 子命令，利刀插件还可以向Chef Infra服务器发出经过身份验证的请求。

trans-unit.source: Knife functionality can be extended with plugins, which work the same as built-in subcommands (including common options). Knife plugins have been written to interact with common cloud providers, to simplify common Chef tasks, and to aid in Chef workflows.
trans-unit.target: Knife功能可以通过插件进行扩展,插件的工作原理与内置子命令相同(包括常用选项)。Knife插件已被编写成与常见的云提供商交互,以简化常见的Chef任务,并帮助Chef工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Knife is configured using a config.rb configuration, which contains configuration for both the knife command line tool as well as any installed knife plugins. See config.rb for a complete list of configuration options in the config.rb file.

trans-unit.source: Knife profiles provide an alternative to using the config.rb files for configuring your knife client. This makes it easier to switch knife between multiple Chef Infra Servers or between multiple organizations on the same Chef Infra Server. Configure knife profiles by adding them to the .chef/credentials file in your home directory on your workstation. The credentials file is TOML formatted. Each profile is listed as a separate ‘table’ name of your choice, and is followed by key-value pairs. The keys correspond to any setting permitted in the config.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 刀配置文件提供了使用 config.rb 文件配置刀客户端的替代方法。这使得在多个Chef Infra服务器之间或同一Chef Infra Server上的多个组织之间切换刀片变得更加容易。通过将刀配置文件添加到工作站主目录中的 .chef/credentials 文件中，进行配置。该 credentials 文件TOML格式化。每个配置文件都作为您选择的单独的“表”名称列出，其后是键值对。这些键对应于config.rb文件中允许的任何设置。

trans-unit.source: Knife profiles provide an alternative to using the config.rb files for configuring your knife client. This makes it easier to switch knife between multiple Chef Infra Servers or between multiple organizations on the same Chef Infra Server. Configure knife profiles by adding them to the .chef/credentials file in your home directory on your workstation. The credentials file is TOML formatted. Each profile is listed as a separate ‘table’ name of your choice, and is followed by key-value pairs. The keys correspond to any setting permitted in the config.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 刀配置文件提供了使用 config.rb 文件配置刀客户端的替代方法。这使得在多个Chef Infra服务器之间或同一Chef Infra Server上的多个组织之间切换刀片变得更加容易。通过将刀配置文件添加到工作站主目录中的 .chef/credentials 文件中，进行配置。该 credentials 文件TOML格式化。每个配置文件都作为您选择的单独的“表”名称列出，其后是键值对。这些键对应于config.rb文件中允许的任何设置。

trans-unit.source: Knife will copy the contents of the ~/.chef/client.d directory on your local workstation to the client.d directory on the device being bootstrapped with the knife bootstrap command. You can also set the client_d_dir option in the config.rb file to point to an arbitrary directory instead of ~/.chef/client.d, and the contents of that directory will be copied to the device being bootstrapped. All config files inside the client.d directory will get copied into the /etc/chef/client.d directory on the system being bootstrapped.
trans-unit.target: Knife会将您本地工作站上 ~/.chef/client.d 目录中的内容复制到使用 knife bootstrap 命令引导的设备上的 client.d 目录中。您还可以在 config.rb 文件中将 client_d_dir 选项设置为指向任意目录，而不是 ~/.chef/client.d ，该目录的内容将复制到正在引导的设备上。 client.d 目录中的所有配置文件将被复制到正在引导的系统上的 /etc/chef/client.d 目录中。

trans-unit.source: Lazy loading does change the way the resource registry is handled in ways that might break some assumptions. Specifically, inspec.<resource> isn’t pre-populated with the core resources that InSpec ships with. If you make a local/custom resource of the same name, referring to the core resource via inspec.<resource> will not resolve to the core resource.
trans-unit.target: 延迟加载的确改变了资源注册表的处理方式，可能会打破某些假设。具体来说， inspec.<resource> 未预先填充InSpec随附的核心资源。如果您使用相同名称的本地/自定义资源，则通过 inspec.<resource> 引用核心资源将不会解析为核心资源。

trans-unit.source: Leaderl
trans-unit.target: Leaderl

trans-unit.source: Leaderl is responsible for ensuring that leadership is assigned to a node that can resolve all requests. If Leaderl fails on the leader node, it will be unable to respond to failures in the PostgreSQL service. The other nodes in the cluster will detect Leaderl’s failure and attempt to take over as leader. However, since Leaderl on the failing node is down, PostgreSQL may still be up and accepting connections.
trans-unit.target: Leaderl负责确保将领导者分配给可以解决所有请求的节点。如果Leaderl在领导者节点上失败，它将无法响应PostgreSQL服务中的失败。群集中的其他节点将检测到Leaderl的故障并尝试接管Leader。但是，由于发生故障的节点上的Leaderl已关闭，因此PostgreSQL可能仍处于启动状态并接受连接。

trans-unit.source: Local mode does not require a configuration file, instead it will look for a directory named /cookbooks and will set chef_repo_path to be just above that. (Local mode will honor the settings in a configuration file, if desired.) If the client.rb file is not found and no configuration file is specified, local mode will search for a config.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 本地模式不需要配置文件，而是会查找名为 /cookbooks 的目录，并将 chef_repo_path 设置在该目录的上方。（如果需要，本地模式将接受配置文件中的设置。）如果未找到client.rb文件且未指定配置文件，则本地模式将搜索config.rb文件。

trans-unit.source: Local mode does not require a configuration file, instead it will look for a directory named /cookbooks and will set chef_repo_path to be just above that. (Local mode will honor the settings in a configuration file, if desired.) If the client.rb file is not found and no configuration file is specified, local mode will search for a knife.rb file.
trans-unit.target: 本地模式不需要配置文件，而是将查找名为 /cookbooks 的目录，并将 chef_repo_path 设置在该目录的上方。（如果需要，本地模式将接受配置文件中的设置。）如果未找到client.rb文件且未指定配置文件，则本地模式将搜索knife.rb文件。

trans-unit.source: Local mode is a way to run the Chef Infra Client against the chef-repo on a local machine as if it were running against the Chef Infra Server. Local mode relies on chef-zero, which acts as a very lightweight instance of the Chef Infra Server. chef-zero reads and writes to the chef_repo_path, which allows all commands that normally work against the Chef Infra Server to be used against the local chef-repo.
trans-unit.target: 本地模式是一种对本地计算机上的chef-repo运行Chef Infra Client的方式，就好像它是针对Chef Infra Server运行的一样。本地模式依赖Chef-zero（零厨师），它充当Chef Infra Server的非常轻量级的实例。chef-zero读取和写入 chef_repo_path ，从而允许将对Chef Infra Server正常工作的所有命令用于本地chef-repo。

trans-unit.source: Local mode is a way to run the chef-client against the chef-repo on a local machine as if it were running against the Chef server. Local mode relies on chef-zero, which acts as a very lightweight instance of the Chef server. chef-zero reads and writes to the chef_repo_path, which allows all commands that normally work against the Chef server to be used against the local chef-repo.
trans-unit.target: 本地模式是一种对本地计算机上的chef-repo运行chef-client的方式，就好像它是针对chef服务器运行的一样。本地模式依赖于Chef-zero，它充当Chef服务器的非常轻量级的实例。chef-zero读取和写入 chef_repo_path ，从而允许将通常对Chef服务器起作用的所有命令用于本地chef-repo。

trans-unit.source: Local mode will store temporary and cache files under the <chef_repo_path>/.cache directory by default. This allows a normal user to run the Chef Infra Client in local mode without requiring root access.
trans-unit.target: 本地模式默认情况下会将临时文件和缓存文件存储在 <chef_repo_path>/.cache 目录下。这样一来，普通用户就可以在本地模式下运行Chef Infra Client，而无需root用户访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Local mode will store temporary and cache files under the <chef_repo_path>/.cache directory by default. This allows a normal user to run the chef-client in local mode without requiring root access.
trans-unit.target: 本地模式默认情况下会将临时文件和缓存文件存储在 <chef_repo_path>/.cache 目录下。这允许普通用户在本地模式下运行chef-client，而无需root用户访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Local storage mode is the default configuration for both backup archives and snapshots. Backups are created and exported into the /var/opt/delivery/backups and /var/opt/delivery/elasticsearch_backups directories. You can configure the storage locations by setting the backup['location'] and backup['elasticsearch']['location'] options in delivery.rb.
trans-unit.target: 本地存储模式是备份存档和快照的默认配置。创建备份并将其导出到 /var/opt/delivery/backups 和 /var/opt/delivery/elasticsearch_backups 目录。您可以通过在 delivery.rb 中设置 backup['location'] 和 backup['elasticsearch']['location'] 选项来配置存储位置。

trans-unit.source: Local traffic selector to use when establishing the VPN tunnel with peer VPN gateway. The value should be a CIDR formatted string, for example 192.168.0.0/16. The ranges should be disjoint. Only IPv4 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 与对等VPN网关建立VPN隧道时要使用的本地流量选择器。该值应该是CIDR格式的字符串，例如 192.168.0.0/16 。范围应不相交。仅支持IPv4。

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X 10.7 calculates the password shadow hash using SALTED-SHA512. The length of the shadow hash value is 68 bytes, the salt value is the first 4 bytes, with the remaining 64 being the shadow hash itself. The following code will calculate password shadow hashes for Mac OS X 10.7:
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X 10.7使用SALTED-SHA512计算密码影子哈希值。影子哈希值的长度是68个字节,盐值是前4个字节,剩下的64个是影子哈希本身。以下代码将计算Mac OS X 10.7的密码影子哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X 10.8 (and higher) calculates the password shadow hash using SALTED-SHA512-PBKDF2. The length of the shadow hash value is 128 bytes, the salt value is 32 bytes, and an integer specifies the number of iterations. The following code will calculate password shadow hashes for Mac OS X 10.8 (and higher):
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X 10.8(及更高版本)使用SALTED-SHA512-BKDF2计算密码影子哈希值。影子哈希值的长度为 128 字节,盐值为 32 字节,并由一个整数指定迭代次数。以下代码将计算Mac OS X 10.8(及更高版本)的密码影子哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X platform only, 10.7 or higher. The salt value for a password shadow hash. Mac OS X version 10.7 uses SALTED-SHA512 and version 10.8 (and higher) uses SALTED-SHA512-PBKDF2 to calculate password shadow hashes.
trans-unit.target: 仅限 Mac OS X 平台,10.7 或更高版本。密码影子哈希的盐值。Mac OS X 10.7版本使用SALTED-SHA512,10.8(及更高版本)使用SALTED-SHA512-BKDF2来计算密码影子哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X platform only, 10.8 (or higher). The number of iterations for a password with a SALTED-SHA512-PBKDF2 shadow hash.
trans-unit.target: 仅限 Mac OS X 平台,10.8(或更高)。具有SALTED-SHA512-BKDF2影子哈希的密码的迭代次数。

trans-unit.source: Maintainer
trans-unit.target: Maintainer

trans-unit.source: Maintainer: Existing origin ‘members’ are now ‘Maintainers’. This role has full read and write access to packages, channels, origin membership, jobs, integrations, invitations, settings. However, the ‘Maintainer’ role is more limited than the past role, in that ‘Maintainers’ only have read access to packages, channels, origin membership, jobs, keys, integrations, and settings. Origin ‘Maintainers’ can read origin membership roles and see and send invitations, but they cannot otherwise change origin membership–their own or anybody else’s. Finally, ‘Maintainers’ can neither read nor write origin secrets.
trans-unit.target: 维护者：现有的原始“成员”现在是“维护者”。该角色具有对程序包，通道，原始成员身份，作业，集成，邀请，设置的完全读写权限。但是，“维护者”角色比过去的角色受到更多限制，因为“维护者”仅具有对程序包，通道，原始成员，作业，密钥，集成和设置的读取权限。原始“维护者”可以读取原始成员资格角色并查看和发送邀请，但他们不能以其他方式更改原始成员资格（他们自己或他人的原始成员）。最后，“维护者”既不能读取也不能写入原始机密。

trans-unit.source: Many DSC resources are comparable to built-in Chef Infra resources. For example, both DSC and Chef have file, package, and service resources. The dsc_script resource is most useful for those DSC resources that do not have a direct comparison to a resource in Chef, such as the Archive resource, a custom DSC resource, an existing DSC script that performs an important task, and so on. Use the dsc_script resource to embed the code that defines a DSC configuration directly within a Chef Infra recipe.
trans-unit.target: 许多DSC资源可与内置Chef Infra资源相媲美。例如，DSC和Chef都具有file，package和service资源。该dsc_script资源是没有直接比较在厨师的资源，比如那些DSC资源最有效的 Archive 资源，定制的DSC资源，现有的DSC脚本，执行一项重要任务，等等。使用dsc_script资源直接在Chef Infra配方中嵌入定义DSC配置的代码。

trans-unit.source: Many of these settings are used by more than one subcommand and/or plugin
trans-unit.target: 这些设置中有许多被多个子命令和/或插件使用。

trans-unit.source: Many optional settings should not be added to the config.rb file. The reasons for not adding them can vary. For example, using --yes as a default in the config.rb file will cause knife to always assume that “Y” is the response to any prompt, which may lead to undesirable outcomes. Other settings, such as --hide-by-mins (used only with the knife status subcommand) or --bare-directories (used only with the knife list subcommand) probably aren’t used often enough (and in the same exact way) to justify adding them to the config.rb file. In general, if the optional settings are not listed on the main config.rb topic, then add settings only after careful consideration. Do not use optional settings in a production environment until after the setting’s performance has been validated in a safe testing environment.
trans-unit.target: 许多可选设置不应添加到config.rb文件中。不添加它们的原因可能有所不同。例如，在config.rb文件中使用 --yes 作为默认值，将使knife始终假定“ Y”是对任何提示的响应，这可能会导致不良结果。其他设置，例如 --hide-by-mins （仅与 knife status 子命令一起使用）或 --bare-directories （仅与 knife list 子命令一起使用），可能使用的频率不够高（并且使用相同的确切方式）以证明将它们添加到config.rb文件中是合理的。通常，如果主config.rb主题上未列出可选设置，然后仅在仔细考虑后添加设置。在安全的测试环境中验证设置的性能之前，请勿在生产环境中使用可选设置。

trans-unit.source: Many optional settings should not be added to the knife.rb file. The reasons for not adding them can vary. For example, using --yes as a default in the knife.rb file will cause knife to always assume that “Y” is the response to any prompt, which may lead to undesirable outcomes. Other settings, such as --hide-healthy (used only with the knife status subcommand) or --bare-directories (used only with the knife list subcommand) probably aren’t used often enough (and in the same exact way) to justify adding them to the knife.rb file. In general, if the optional settings are not listed on the main knife.rb topic, then add settings only after careful consideration. Do not use optional settings in a production environment until after the setting’s performance has been validated in a safe testing environment.
trans-unit.target: 许多可选设置不应添加到knife.rb文件中。不添加它们的原因可能有所不同。例如，在knife.rb文件中使用 --yes 作为默认值，将使knife始终假定“ Y”是对任何提示的响应，这可能导致不良结果。其他设置，例如 --hide-healthy （仅与 --bare-directories knife status 子命令一起使用）或--bare-directories（仅与knight knife list 子命令一起使用）可能无法经常使用（并且以相同的精确方式）有理由将它们添加到knife.rb文件中。通常，如果主刀.rb主题上未列出可选设置，然后仅在仔细考虑后添加设置。在安全的测试环境中验证设置的性能之前，请勿在生产环境中使用可选设置。

trans-unit.source: Map files in a shared directory to the current release directory. The symbolic links for these files are created before any migration is run. Use parentheses ( ) around curly braces { } to ensure the contents within the curly braces are interpreted as a block and not as an empty Hash. Set to symlink_before_migrate({}) to prevent the creation of symbolic links.
trans-unit.target: 将共享目录中的文件映射到当前发行目录。这些文件的符号链接是在运行任何迁移之前创建的。在花括号 { } 周围使用括号 ( ) ，以确保花括号内的内容被解释为一个块，而不是一个空的哈希。设置为 symlink_before_migrate({}) 以防止创建符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Map files in a shared directory to the current release directory. The symbolic links for these files are created before any migration is run. Use parentheses ( ) around curly braces { } to ensure the contents within the curly braces are interpreted as a block and not as an empty Hash. Set to symlink_before_migrate({}) to prevent the creation of symbolic links. Default value: {"config/database.yml" => "config/database.yml"}.
trans-unit.target: 将共享目录中的文件映射到当前发行目录。这些文件的符号链接是在运行任何迁移之前创建的。在花括号 { } 周围使用括号 ( ) ，以确保花括号内的内容被解释为一个块，而不是一个空的哈希。设置为 symlink_before_migrate({}) 以防止创建符号链接。默认值： {"config/database.yml" => "config/database.yml"} 。

trans-unit.source: Map files in a shared directory to their paths in the current release directory. This property runs after create_dirs_before_symlink and purge_before_symlink.
trans-unit.target: 将共享目录中的文件映射到当前发行目录中的路径。此属性在 create_dirs_before_symlink 和 purge_before_symlink 之后运行。

trans-unit.source: Map files in a shared directory to their paths in the current release directory. This property runs after create_dirs_before_symlink and purge_before_symlink. Default value: {"system" => "public/system", "pids" => "tmp/pids", "log" => "log"}.
trans-unit.target: 将共享目录中的文件映射到当前发行目录中的路径。此属性在 create_dirs_before_symlink 和 purge_before_symlink 之后运行。默认值： {"system" => "public/system", "pids" => "tmp/pids", "log" => "log"} 。

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of seconds the response to a signed URL request will be considered fresh, defaults to 1hr (3600s). After this time period, the response will be revalidated before being served. When serving responses to signed URL requests, Cloud CDN will internally behave as though all responses from this backend had a “Cache-Control: public, max-age=[TTL]” header, regardless of any existing Cache-Control header. The actual headers served in responses will not be altered.
trans-unit.target: 对签名的URL请求的响应的最大秒数将被认为是最新的，默认值为1小时（3600秒）。在此时间段之后，响应将在提供之前重新验证。在提供对签名的URL请求的响应时，Cloud CDN在内部将表现为好像来自此后端的所有响应都具有“ Cache-Control：public，max-age = [TTL]”标头，而与任何现有的Cache-Control标头无关。响应中提供的实际标题不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of seconds the response to a signed URL request will be considered fresh. After this time period, the response will be revalidated before being served. trans-unit.source: Mesos has support for containerizers for running commands and applications within isolated containers. Mesos supports Docker and its own Mesos containerizer format. The Mesos containerizer provides lightweight containerization with cgroups/namespaces isolation without actual isolation. The hab pkg export mesos command creates a mostly empty base filesystem with the application and the Chef Habitat Supervisor and packages it into a compressed tarball.
trans-unit.target: Mesos支持容器化器，以便在隔离的容器中运行命令和应用程序。 Mesos支持Docker及其自己的Mesos容器格式。 Mesos容器化器提供轻量级的容器化，具有 cgroups/namespaces 隔离，而无需实际隔离。该 hab pkg export mesos 命令创建与应用程序和厨师居监事并将其打包成一个压缩的tar包一大部分是空的基础文件系统。

trans-unit.source: Method to determine how to switch to a new server if the current one fails, which can either be roundrobin or priority. roundrobin randomly selects a URL out of the list of URLs to start with and proceeds through each of them as it encounters a failure contacting the host. priority starts from the first baseurl listed and reads through them sequentially.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前服务器发生故障时如何切换到新服务器的方法，该方法可以是 roundrobin 或 priority 。 roundrobin 从URL列表中随机选择一个URL作为开始，并在遇到与主机的连接失败时继续遍历每个URL。 priority 从列出的第一个 baseurl 开始，并依次读取它们。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Active Directory (MSAD) is a type of directory server that supports LDAP. Chef Automate comes with a default LDAP configuration for MSAD. The Chef Automate default MSAD configuration is a minimal configuration for standard MSAD systems, which you can extend by overriding default values and using additional configuration options. Chef Automate’s default configuration for Microsoft AD is specific to LDAP. To configure Microsoft AD using SAML, see the SAML documentation.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Active Directory（MSAD）是一种支持LDAP的目录服务器。Chef Automate带有MSAD的默认LDAP配置。Chef Automate默认MSAD配置是标准MSAD系统的最低配置，您可以通过覆盖默认值并使用其他配置选项来进行扩展。Chef Automate的Microsoft AD的默认配置特定于LDAP。要使用SAML配置Microsoft AD，请参阅SAML文档。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows: A quoted 3-5 character string that defines the octal mode that is translated into rights for Microsoft Windows security. For example: '755', '0755', or 00755. Values up to '0777' are allowed (no sticky bits) and mean the same in Microsoft Windows as they do in UNIX, where 4 equals GENERIC_READ, 2 equals GENERIC_WRITE, and 1 equals GENERIC_EXECUTE. This property cannot be used to set :full_control. This property has no effect if not specified, but when it and rights are both specified, the effects are cumulative.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows：带引号的3-5个字符串，定义八进制模式，该八进制模式已转换为Microsoft Windows安全性的权限。例如： '755' ， '0755' 或 00755 。允许的值最大为 '0777' （没有粘性位），并且在Microsoft Windows中的含义与在UNIX中的含义相同，其中 4 等于 GENERIC_READ ， 2 等于 GENERIC_WRITE ， 1 等于 GENERIC_EXECUTE 。该属性不能用于设置 :full_control 。如果未指定，则此属性无效，但在其生效日期和 rights 时无效 都指定，效果是累积的。
